## tsbc recreate

Command used to recreate SBC nodes

```
tsbc recreate [flags]
```

### Examples

```
tsbc recreate --fqdn-name sbc.test.com
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help               help for recreate
      --log-level string   set log level (default "info")
      --sbc-fqdn string    fqdn of the sbc cluster to restart
```
